head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FEDIGAN, CHRISTOPHER J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FEDIGAN, CHRISTOPHER J.

block.p: FEDIGAN-Christopher J. Age 92, on October 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Anne (nee Maguire), devoted brother of the late Catherine, Josephine, James and Frank. Also survived by nine nieces and nephews. Viewing at the David J. Hodder & Son Funeral Home, 899 McLean Avenue (near Kimball Ave.), Yonkers, Monday, 7-9 PM, Tuesday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass Wednesday at St. Barnabas Church, 9:45 AM. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers please make donations to The Calvary Fund, 1740 East Chester Road, Bronx, NY.
